snippet: The death of Alphonza Bryant III, who was killed last month, has helped fuel an increasingly rancorous debate over the Police Department’s stop-and-frisk tactics.
abstract: New York City police arrest two unidentified suspects in fatal shooting of Bronx teenager Alphonza Bryant III; Bryant's death has helped fuel heated debate over New York Police Dept's stop-and-frisk tactics.
lead_paragraph: The death of Alphonza Bryant III, who was killed last month, has helped fuel an increasingly rancorous debate over the Police Department’s stop-and-frisk tactics.

headline.seo: Two People Are Arrested in Fatal Shooting of Alphonza Bryant
headline.main: Two Are Arrested in Fatal Shooting of Bronx Teenager
headline.print_headline: Two Are Arrested In Fatal Shooting Of Bronx Teenager
